title: React Chat Application
description: This project was created in React as part of a university course in UX and web implementation using modern frameworks. The goal was to create an MVP of a chat application, which was intended for a specific use scenario, in this case, guests visiting a hostel.
The database functionality was implemented with Back4App (a Backend as a Service using the Parse API) and version control/collaboration was done with GitHub. The project is deployed using Netlify.
